mapper.delete: DELETE B FROM t_diary A LEFT JOIN t_diary_pic B ON A.diary_id = B.diary_id WHERE (A.diary_id, A.user_id) = (#{diaryId},#{loginedUserId});
mapper.select: SELECT C.nickname ,A.user_id as loginedUserId, A.title, A.contents ,A.created_at as createdAt,A.diary_id as diaryId FROM t_diary A INNER JOIN t_user C ON A.user_id = C.user_id WHERE A.user_id = #{loginedUserId} AND A.is_del = 0 ORDER BY A.diary_id DESC LIMIT #{startIdx},#{rowCount}
